byline: Stan Alcorn, Shannon Mullen, Bruce Johnson, Gigi Douban, Chester Wisniewski, Stephan Richter, David Gura and David Brancaccio
teaser: Apple CEO Tim Cook tries to answer the $1.7 trillion question: How does the U.S. get corporations to repatriate their overseas profits? Microsoft unveils their new Xbox, and all it has to do is catch up with the last eight years of digital devices. Before 9/11, many local TV broadcasters transmitted from the World Trade Center. Now, they are being wooed by the Freedom Tower, but there's competition from other skyscrapers.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, May 21, 2013

title: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, May 21, 2013
